preface.para: &suse;® CaaS (Container as a Service) Platform is a &kube;-based container management solution used by application development and DevOps teams to deploy, manage, and scale container-based applications and services. Enterprises use SUSE CaaS Platform to reduce application delivery cycle times and improve business agility. Focused on providing an exceptional platform operator experience, &productname; delivers &kube; innovations in a complete, enterprise-grade solution that enables IT to deliver the power of &kube; to users more quickly, consistently, and efficiently.
&productname; runs on a cluster of four or more nodes. Each node can host multiple pods of containers, and the entire cluster is managed from a web-based dashboard.
